sentences.english: I live at 168 South Fuxingmen Street.
sentences.chinese: 复兴门南大街一六八号。

sentences.english: Albatrosses nesting in the Southern Ocean often undertake circumpolar trips between breeding seasons.
sentences.chinese: 信天翁在南大洋筑巢往往繁殖季节之间进行极地考察。

sentences.english: I am the 3rd year student of Southeast University.
sentences.chinese: 是一名东南大学三年级学生。

sentences.english: I shall accept the arrangements of Henan University regarding my study.
sentences.chinese: 接受河南大学对学习的安排。

sentences.english: Xingge Liu, Central South University, China.
This mountain range runs north and south down the middle of the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 这座山运行范围北和南大洋中的下降。

sentences.english: In the foreground are scenes visible over a rocky coastline toward the Southern Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 前景是一眼就能看见的南大洋布满岩石群的海岸线。

sentences.english: President Carter and his wife visit Yuelu Academy.
sentences.chinese: 卡特及夫人参观湖南大学岳麓书院。

sentences.english: The evolution of Henan University went with modern city transition of Kaifeng.
sentences.chinese: 河南大学的变迁顺应了近代开封的城市转型。

sentences.english: I attended Cental South University and Harvard.
sentences.chinese: 我毕业于中南大学和哈佛大学。

sentences.english: Li Zhenjiang, professor of the College of Law in Henan University.
sentences.chinese: 李振江，河南大学法学院教授。

sentences.english: Yan Zhen, a famous writer, is now a professor of Zhong Nan University.
sentences.chinese: 阎真，著名作家，现为中南大学教授。

sentences.english: People call it "the south gate of China".
sentences.chinese: 人们都称之为“中国的南大门”。

sentences.english: There are 34 undergraduate specialties and 23 laboratories for teaching in Hainan University.
sentences.chinese: 海南大学现有本科专业34个，教学实验室23个。

sentences.english: Yes, I graduated from Henan University last July.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我刚于去年7月从河南大学毕业。
